name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No Limits - Web Tracker and Personal Notebook

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and efficient Web Activity Tracker and personal notebook for your daily needs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As a web user, it's important to be mindful of how we spend our time online. That's why I created this browser extension, to help track and visualize your web habits. With its focus on time tracking, you'll gain valuable insights into your web activity and be able to identify areas where you can improve. Discover new habits and make the most of your time spent on the web.

Gain a comprehensive understanding of your data with clear and interactive graphs and charts, allowing for an easy and intuitive way to identify trends and patterns.

Features:
‣ Simple, visually pleasing UI
‣ Quick overview of your most visited sites
‣ Data visualization
‣ Interactive date selection
‣ To-do list management
‣ Quick note-taking capabilities

Limitations:
‣ To conserve battery life, tracking pauses after approximately 1 minute of inactivity.
‣ Unfortunately, the extension does not currently offer the ability to sync with your Google account.

So what are you waiting for? Get started today and experience the power of a more productive web browsing experience!
